text: The Beslan school siege (or the Beslan massacre) was a terrorist attack on 1 September 2004. It lasted three days. 1,100 people were hostages and 333 people were killed. It is considered to be the deadliest school shooting in history."Russian Children Return to School on 'Day of Knowledge'". title: Beslan school siege
